column4: he said, it worked before installing to HD from the USB thumb - my suspicion might be some apt-get installs on the Ubuntu side
likely, but I always make sure the network is set up correctly first.  anytime you aren't in control of the network, things can change at a whimn
terrorPhysicist: I always prefer to use VNC in "User Mode" and put that into the Autostart Folder for having more control
